mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_visa ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, code, handling_date, user_id, state, commission_state, receive_type_id, receive_date, service_id, service_order_id, installment_num, installment, payment_voucher_image_url_1, payment_voucher_image_url_2, visa_voucher_image_url, receivable, received, per_amount, amount, expect_amount, discount, gst, deduct_gst, bonus, bonus_date, adviser_id, mara_id, official_id, remarks, is_close) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{code}, #{handlingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId}, #{state}, 'DJY', #{receiveTypeId}, #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serviceId}, #{serviceOrderId}, #{installmentNum}, #{installment}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl1}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl2}, #{visaVoucherImageUrl}, #{receivable}, #{received}, #{perAmount}, #{amount}, #{expectAmount}, #{discount}, #{gst}, #{deductGst}, #{bonus}, #{bonusDate}, #{adviserId}, #{maraId}, #{officialId}, #{remarks}, 0);
mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(bonus), 0.00) from b_visa where DATE_FORMAT(gmt_create, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and is_close = 0;

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, code, handling_date AS handlingDate, user_id AS userId, state, commission_state AS commissionState, receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, receive_date AS receiveDate, service_id AS serviceId, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, installment_num AS installmentNum, installment, payment_voucher_image_url_1 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl1, payment_voucher_image_url_2 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl2, visa_voucher_image_url AS visaVoucherImageUrl, receivable, received, per_amount AS perAmount, amount, expect_amount AS expectAmount, discount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, bonus_date AS bonusDate, adviser_id AS adviserId, mara_id AS maraId, official_id AS officialId, remarks, is_close AS isClose FROM b_visa WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_visa WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
